long_description: Women adventurers turn to the Julbo MonteRosa glacier sunglasses for total coverage and protection from harsh sunlight and extreme weather. Spectron 4 polycarbonate lenses block 100% of UV rays and 95% of visible light, reducing glare and creating a clear image. Flash treatment to lenses creates a mirror effect that helps filter visible light; anti-glare treatment to lenses eliminates glare reflections. Lightweight, tough nylon frames with flexible temples allow a natural fit to a variety of face shapes. Grippy inserts at ear stem ends become tacky as you perspire, holding eyewear in place during strenuous activity; does not stick to hair. Unique shields block light coming from the sides; can be removed as needed. Julbo Monterosa sunglasses include a protective case for storage.
short_description: Women adventurers turn to the Julbo MonteRosa glacier sunglasses for total coverage and protection from harsh sunlight and extreme weather.
